website_summaries.verdict: The House of Marley Smile Jamaica earphones is an affordable, eco-friendly earphone option for serious bass lovers, but they aren't for those seeking a balanced mix.
pros: Powerful, clean audio performance geared toward bass lovers
Green materials including FSC-certified wood and recyclable aluminum
cons: Massive bass presence overpowers high-mids and highs

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: After a search, I came across House of Marley, and the Uplift headphones--they are great--well made, great sound, and a very reasonable price--seems like most earphone makers want $50+ these days. Very nice, subtle design, solid construction, and very simple (l chose the version without a mic and controller on the lines, because I was looking for a set that was as simple as possible, but Marley sells both styles, if you need that). The fact that Marley makes great, eco-conscious headphones and contributes to the Marley Foundation makes these earphones the best choice out there.
customer_reviews.author: old cold water

customer_reviews.title: but they have overall good sound.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones conduct static electricity directly into your ears! I can't hang out with my fluffy dog when I'm wearing them, but they have overall good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Clare E

customer_reviews.title: Decent sounding buds
customer_reviews.text: The aesthetic is amazing, they sound good too! I reccomend getting better ear tips though.. the stock ones tend to slip out of my ear easily
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking unique ear buds
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift and the person loved them. The ends are real wood and they look very nice. They look like they should cost a lot more than they do. The sound quality is decent, nothing like your high end buds but fine overall.
customer_reviews.author: Edward O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: spend like $10 on Apple earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, spend like $10 on Apple earbuds, because the sound quality for these are not very good. I'm not sure if this is for everyone, but whenever I use them, it always sounds like there is some kind of static in the background and maybe it might just be that this product is defective, because I saw the other reviews which made me want to make this purchase. I'm upset about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Worth Owning a Pair.
customer_reviews.text: It has a really wholesome sound that is hard to beat. I've heard that they might be a little prone to breaking so I've taking really good care of them. So far, everything's been great...they're not as comfortable as i thought they would be, but still worth it b/c i feel like I'm supporting a cause.
customer_reviews.author: Sharran Sukumaran

customer_reviews.title: Good earphone for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had the same earphones which I bought about one and half years back. It worked perfectly. Unfortunately, I put it in my washing machine by mistake which broke it. I got this one and it has been working as expected till now.
customer_reviews.author: Priyadarshi Kunal

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounds bad, not durable at all. Stay away from these. (Stay away from all Marley earphone/headphones actually..)
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: No MIC sound average.
customer_reviews.text: Why can't they tell you there is no microphone...THERE IS NO MICROPHONE ON THESE! Sound is average. I have Marley's that sound better....IMO Marley has gone downhill.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Best sound quality I have heard from earphones
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding sound quality at a low price. I don't know how very high end earphones sound, but I recommend these earphones to all casual earphone users for either musical listening or conversations.
customer_reviews.author: Discreet User

customer_reviews.title: Even though they look great and sounded fine I would not recommend them because ...
customer_reviews.text: Have bought two sets of these and both have lasted a very short time. Only one side works and that is the same for the both of them. Even though they look great and sounded fine I would not recommend them because the have a short lifespan.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love House of Marley -- sturdy/durable/comfortable -- my previous pair had a microphone but these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Rodney W. Schmisseur

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are really good, the only problem that I see with them is the lack of a controller for the volume or to change tracks, but with this price I can't complain too much about it.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Aburto

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great, but bass-heavy. I really like the non-tangle cord. They're great for someone that isn't picky about sound quality, but they're definitely not audiophile-level headphones. Plus, they look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: One of the ear buds stopped working after 2 months. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product... sound quality is superb.. compared to more expensive products...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I received a pair WITHOUT the Apple 3-button mic/remote
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these specifically because they had a 3-button Apple mic/remote, as noted in the description. I was sent the wrong pair that was missing this feature, so I sent them back. I didn't try them out since I had to return them, so I don't know the sound quality, but they were well-made and beautiful. It's too bad they were missing the feature that was make or break for me.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Senbei

customer_reviews.title: Best 24 bucks I've ever spent.
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I am very picky when it comes to headphones. I also tend to run through them rather quickly. These lasted me 2 full years before I decided to replace them! I just bought another pair in a cooler color. The wood used to create them also makes the sound fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Affordable quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound that these deliver is well above other ear buds at this price point. The best thing about House of Marley ear buds to me is the comfort. I can honestly wear them for hours with zero irritation. Definitely a smart purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Griggs

customer_reviews.title: These were bought as a gift for my husband. ...
customer_reviews.text: These were bought as a gift for my husband. They are just what he wanted. He uses them all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Bryan

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much from the headphones that costs just $20 but house of marley made an amazing thing here! Low bass in perfect for me and design in solid! Overal 100/100
customer_reviews.author: Deimantas

customer_reviews.title: quality sound
customer_reviews.text: made bullet headphones out of these. They work great and sound amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Great sound. I would definitely recommend these. They are my favorite headphones by far.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Mccoy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and noise cancellation! I wore these on a 6+ hour flight and experienced no discomfort and could hear content very well! The cord is also very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a few Marley's, as gifts and for myself, sadly the last pair broke, but that was all on myself. I love the quality, these are far superior i believe in part due to them not having a built in mic. 5 stars just on the quality of all my marley's
customer_reviews.author: Sherian Damian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great with tablet, laptop and in gym. Long enough doesn't tangle.
customer_reviews.author: doggydaycare

customer_reviews.title: These are great headphones! House of Marley has been a favorite ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones! House of Marley has been a favorite brand of mine. However one of the earbuds always quits after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: BlindTD428

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I go through headphones super fast. So I heard about House Of Marley, I didn't have a lot of money so I went with Smile Jamica Fire. So far, these headphones are the best I've owned, I got them days before expected.
customer_reviews.author: Meranda

customer_reviews.title: Sound Great and look Great
customer_reviews.text: Sound Great and look Great ! And the merchants (Guy & Anna) who supplied these Buds up-graded my shipping to 2 day. Thanks Guy's !
customer_reviews.author: Donzel

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good, I like it isolated the noise
customer_reviews.text: A bit more expensive than I bought it from T-mobile stire before. Quality is good, I like it isolated the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffiona Chi

customer_reviews.title: excellent headphones!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent head phones!! I love them. I was looking for headphones that I could commute with and these are a gem, very happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: OK NO MICRROPHONE SO IT USES THE ONE IN MY PHONE NOT SO GOOD
customer_reviews.author: Jane Peters

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it have soul like a thin glass. when i use with move it say ziziziiziziziziizic. so dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite pair of earbuds I've ever owned and I've been through plenty!!
customer_reviews.author: mkba

customer_reviews.title: Disappointingly low sound quality and bass
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality and bass is the worst of any Marley headphones I've ever used. Just. Spend a few bucks more and get the good ones
customer_reviews.author: Hudom

customer_reviews.title: i beat the crap out of ear-buds!
customer_reviews.text: THEY WORK FANTASTIC! House of Marley supplies some of the greatest sounding/ durable ear-buds going. spend a little extra, it's way worth it!
customer_reviews.author: j m h

customer_reviews.title: These are cool.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for DIY .40 S&W bullet earphones. The little Mic is too high up near my cheek but i can live with that. Sound quality is not bad but my Sony Extra Bass earphones sound better. I wanted some cool bullet earphones thats the only reason i got these (you can YouTube it on how to make them) and these are made from recycled materials. Or so they say. Do i recommend these? Sure, but theres better options out there.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Last really long time!!
customer_reviews.text: I washed the headphone couple of times, even went through dryer once! Eek! But it works perfectly fine with good bass. I really like the cords.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These lasted a couple months and then the left earbud stopped playing sound is usual with these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best ear buds ever. I'm a return customer for these guys.
customer_reviews.author: Skot Land

customer_reviews.title: good but wanted case
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with a carrying case just the headphones a manuals
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I get excellent eb accurate and complete date without any problem thanks
customer_reviews.author: Rosa santa Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price for quality sound, especially acoustic & folk music. Mumford & Sons really come to life in these buds.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: When I first got these, I was really affected by the effect of hearing the movement of the cord very loudly through the earphones which is mentioned in some of the other reviews. However, I've been using these for some months now and I've realised that most of the time, the cord shouldn't move very much when you're listening to music, unless you do so while running of course and nowadays the effect doesn't bother me as much anymore. All in all, I've come to really like these earphones. They look great, are made with the environmental impact of its manufacturing in mind and the sound quality is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Lim

customer_reviews.title: One Love
customer_reviews.text: Well, after you try these you will get another pair,,,and leave those other ones at home...these STAY in your ears ,,,,,Ever loving...Ever Living ! The QC20 i Nope.....always Take these for that 5 mile walkabout....There it is
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ray

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Average sound but suppose thats what you get for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hammond

customer_reviews.title: good for the average user
customer_reviews.text: these are very good ear buds. i have owned many of Marley cans so these ones are very good. these are loud but i noticed that the louder you go the more faded the sound get it cant do detail that well at the higher volumes. at lower volumes the bass is ok. if you want bass heavy ear buds do not get these. these ear buds are better for mid-range to the highs. but overall good for the average user and great for the price i would recommend
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Not a tangle free headphones, really annoying when i pick it from my bag.
customer_reviews.text: Not at all a fan of the headphones, mainly because of the headphones being tangling. I expected it to be tangle free as it from House of Marley. Headphones are good looking, and sounds decent for the price. Only gripe is it gets tangled very quickly and it very annoying
customer_reviews.author: Azhar

customer_reviews.title: Best Earbuds yet
customer_reviews.text: These are the best earbuds I have used so far. Must be something with the wood, it makes them sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Good sound overall
customer_reviews.text: Good sound overall. Has a strong bass, however my pair broke down after three weeks. The wood gives a stronger sound meaning you can lower the volume more. I just got a set of Griffin earphones and the quality of sound it's a lot better. In comparison, the Griffin wood earphones are best compared to this model.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Just too much noise from the cord!
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound! It's great for loud music. At least then you don't hear the noise the cord makes with even the slightest movement.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Weel

customer_reviews.title: poor quality defected item
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this brand before and the quaility was superb. When i recieved this one i was dissapointeed that the products quailty was way below par, leading me to believe it was defected. Very disappointed with these and would not recommend them. Recieved a refund although not for the original shipping cost which was almost the cost of the item!
customer_reviews.author: Dalia laniado

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am really pissed off, this is probably the 3rd earphones I'm ordering from Amazon and they all have stopped working after 1-2 months!!!!!!!!! And it's always the the right side that goes out. I want a refund!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: He was so stoked and loved them for about 3 months when one side completely ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my husband for Christmas. He was so stoked and loved them for about 3 months when one side completely stopped working. I have tried contacting the manufacture with no response. I am surprised that a company with such a reputation would have such a faulty product and not stand by it. May have been a faulty item from the seller? Either way, he is out a pair of headphones and I am out the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy D.

customer_reviews.title: Shut up and take my money!
customer_reviews.text: Best earbuds I've ever owned! Fast and easy shipping. Bass is INSANE
customer_reviews.author: Nick Buckner

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as my last order
customer_reviews.text: I ordered previously and loved them so much I bought again.....I THOUGHT. Didn't like these as well as the last ones, also called Midnight. Only when I went back and looked did I discover the code is different. I like the EM-JE010-MI headphones. These ones - the .....040....version - have the "I hear the cord bouncing against my coat" phenomenon. Mike in the cord? I don't know but I don't like that.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: one side does not work and seller didn't even reply back, wtf
customer_reviews.author: Heeown Chae

product_meta.title: House of Marley EM-JE040-MI Smile Jamaica Midnight In-Ear Headphones
product_meta.description: Style:Midnight| Color:Smile Jamaica| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe Marley Smile Jamaica In Ear Headphone is a great looking, earth-friendly collection with amazing audio performance. FSC-certified wood, recyclable aluminum and a powerful 8mm driver combine responsible style with great sound.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars842 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
